name: islandora-cwrc-writer
description: A wrapper to use CWRC-Writer with Islandora.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfiles && npm run build:js
scripts.copyfiles: npm run copy:images && npm run copy:css && npm run copy:xml
scripts.build:js: mkdirp build/js && browserify js/app.js --standalone GitWriter > build/js/app.js --verbose -g deamdify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.debugbuild:js: mkdirp build/js && browserify js/app.js --standalone GitWriter > build/js/app.js --debug --verbose -g deamdify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.watch: watchify js/app.js --debug --standalone GitWriter -o build/js/app.js --verbose -g deamdify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
